paragraphs.content: Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust.

paragraphs.content: O my soul, thou hast said unto the LORD, Thou art my Lord: my goodness extendeth not to thee;
paragraphs.contentHtml: O my soul, thou hast said unto the Lord, Thou art my Lord: my goodness extendeth not to thee;

paragraphs.content: But to the saints that are in the earth, and to the excellent, in whom is all my delight.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But to the saints that are in the earth, and to the excellent, in whom is all my delight.

paragraphs.content: Their sorrows shall be multiplied that hasten after another god: their drink offerings of blood will I not offer, nor take up their names into my lips.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Their sorrows shall be multiplied that hasten after another god: their drink offerings of blood will I not offer, nor take up their names into my lips.

paragraphs.content: The LORD is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.

paragraphs.content: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.

paragraphs.content: I will bless the LORD, who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night seasons.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will bless the Lord, who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night seasons.

paragraphs.content: I have set the LORD always before me: because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have set the Lord always before me: because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved.

paragraphs.content: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.

paragraphs.content: For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.

paragraphs.content: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
